0: The hotel facility is great with a huge beautiful lobby nice bar and comfortable clean rooms
The accommodations are excellent and if you choose not to dine at the hotel the location has plenty of selection for food choices within 10 minutes drive
Room was beautiful with an awesome bed set up like a suite bar sink but no fridge lobby and restaurant lovely
Very nice lobby and clean rooms
Lobby was nice and people were friendly
There always seems to something going on in the cavernous and beautiful atrium style lobby
Friendly staff nice decor clean polside area was very nice amenities etc
The place was buzzing with a party gathering in the lobby
The staff at the hotel were exceptional in offering us some necessities like a toothbrush upon check in
1: Also the construction sounds were way too loud all day and even the lobby was covered in dust and interrupted lunch service
The elevators are slow at breakfast the egg cooker was missing and they had no eggs in the buffet
For Hilton I was surprised there was a lot of wear of the tub and the lobby furniture
My daughter with a freshly sprained ankle had to walk up and down nine flights of stairs for breakfast and then to load the car
On the day of our departure the elevators were down
One time I could smell paint when I exited the elevator but once in my room no problem
When I enter the building wow heavy construction in the lobby
Jackhammers inside the lobby and saws cutting tile all day for my 4 nights
Was n’t able to have planned meetings in the lobby and had to rent a car and leave for quiet
They were renovating the lobby yet it was still attractive and well maintained
